name: PORT OF WALLA WALLA
sampleDescriptions: Monitor Congressional consideration of FAA Reauthorization and consideration of contract tower language in same.
Monitor FY18 Energy and Water Appropriations related to USACOE funding for Mill Creek Flood Control GI Study.
Monitor implementation of WIIN Act, WRDA reauthorization; monitor Federal timber policy and funding for wildfire management.
Monitor Congressional consideration of FY2018 THUD Appropriations; monitor the USDOT Implementation of the FAST Act, P.L. 114-94.
Monitor FY18 USACOE work plan and FY19 Energy and Water Appropriations related to USACOE funding for the Mill Creek Flood Control GI Study.
